extendedInfo.description: **ATTENTION** Installation problems?  Please read below.This color is a symbol of innocence, victims of terrorism, violence against women, peace, right to life, bone cancer, adoptees, and retinal blastoma, emphysema, lung cancer, mesothelioma, and multiple sclerosisSpice up your home screen with a doo-dad, a widget for your Android device. Doo-dads are designed to add a little bling to your screen without changing your background. Do you have the perfect wallpaper, but you think it's missing a little something to set it off? That's where doo-dads come in. Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery.To install this doo-dad, follow these instructions:1. Purchase, download, and install the app2. Go to a blank area on your home screen and long-press3. When the menu comes up, select Widgets4. Look for the doo-dad and select itYour doo-dad should appear on the screen. To move it around, just long-press the image until you see it increase in size; then move it to where you want it. Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad!keywords: cancer, lung, doo-dads, doodads, dodads, decoration, graffiti, graphics, awesome, art, sticker, decal, eye candy, personalization, dml, dark matter lab

reviews.comment: Genuinely decent to not charge for this, other devs charge for ribbons, I know people have to make $ but there is something called charity. Thanks dev
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: In memory of Joseph L. Sonner II and Tex Holley
reviews.comment: Thank you, Dark Matter Lab. Awesome ribbon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I was looking thru the app store and came across this, I saw it and was like perfect! Thanks for making it. My daddy has lung cancer and my grandmomma passed away from lung cancer! <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hoping for a Cure
reviews.comment: I have installed this app and followed the instructions. Its not working. Its for my dad who has stage 4 nsc double lung cancer. He was given 6 months. He has made it two soo far. I have an siii and this means allot to me... any advise?
reviews.author: Nicole Zavala

reviews.title: Phishing
reviews.comment: After I downloaded this I couldn\'t find it in my apps so I went on my computer and Norton said it was trying to break into my system and my Facebook was hacked by it
